trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the shift parameter mask constants in Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 中切換參數遮罩常數相容的常數。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, mouse button parameter mask constants were used to represent the state of mouse buttons in the `Button` parameter of various mouse event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，滑鼠按鈕參數遮罩常數用來代表中的滑鼠按鈕狀態`Button`各種滑鼠事件處理常式的參數。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, the parameters for mouse events have changed and these constants are no longer necessary.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中的滑鼠事件的參數已變更而且不再需要這些常數。

trans-unit.source: These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without further modification.
trans-unit.target: 這些常數可啟用從 Visual Basic 6.0，才能繼續執行不需要進一步修改已升級的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 函式和物件中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 .NET Framework 實作有顯著差異時，才會需要這些函式和物件。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbLeftButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 常數 <see langword="vbLeftButton" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbMiddleButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 常數 <see langword="vbMiddleButton" />。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <see langword="vbRightButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 相當於 Visual Basic 6.0 常數 <see langword="vbRightButton" />。
